product_name: BOB Revolution / Strides Single Sun Shield
long_description: Protect your child-the BOB Single Sun Shield reduces heat inside stroller, as well as glare and harmful UVA/UVB rays from sun light. Also offers protection from wind and flying insects. Allows children to see out and parents to see in. Durable nylon frame and nylon mesh window. Elastic attachment is simple and easy. Fits BOB single Revolution and Strides strollers.
short_description: Protect your child-the BOB Single Sun Shield reduces heat inside stroller, as well as glare and harmful UVA/UVB rays from sun light.
